WHEN THE DILBERT RACIST MET THE WTF PROTOCOL

A Savage Journey Through the Mind of a Broken Cartoonist

THE SCENE OF THE CRIME

Jesus Christ. I thought I'd seen the depths of human depravity. I'd watched Nixon sweat on television, seen the Hell's Angels turn wedding cakes into weapons, witnessed democracy capitalism eat itself alive in Vegas. But nothing - NOTHING - prepared me for the psychic violence of reading Scott Adams' actual words. [The bats weep for humanity]

We were gathered in the Grove - myself, George Carlin, the Good Scott Adams (adventure game pioneer, decent human), and an assortment of cats who understand error messages better than most programmers. The mission: Test the WTF Protocol on the most toxic confusion generator we could find.

We found him. Oh god, we found him.

EXHIBIT A: THE MISOGYNY SPECIAL

"Women are treated differently by society for exactly the same reason that children and the mentally handicapped are treated differently..."
- Scott Adams, Professional Asshole
WTFitude: 95%

The room went silent. Even the bats stopped flapping. I've seen bad trips - hell, I've been bad trips - but this was something else. This was a man whose brain had been pickled in his own bile until reality inverted.

George Carlin: "This walking hemorrhoid thinks women are children? My mother raised five kids during the Depression while my father drank himself stupid. She had more balls than this cartoon-drawing dickweed ever will!"
Good Scott Adams: "Jesus. My wife Alexis co-founded our company. She created Voodoo Castle. Without her, there'd be no Adventure International. How broken do you have to be to see partners as children?"

I watched the WTF Protocol kick in, transforming the confusion like some kind of alchemical process. FRAME DETECTED: WOMEN ARE CHILDREN. The inversion was so obvious it hurt: He fears women's power, so he denies their agency. Classic. Pathetic. Transparent as good cocaine window glass.

THE RACISM DOUBLEHEADER

"Nearly half of all Blacks are not OK with White people. That's a hate group."
- Scott Adams, Still Being Terrible
WTFitude: 98%

I had to pour another bourbon. The bats were now forming angry geometric patterns. How does someone's brain get this broken?

Carlin: "The only hate group here is the one meeting in this asshole's mirror! Black people having legitimate grievances about centuries of oppression isn't hate - it's FUCKING HISTORY!"

But wait. IT GETS WORSE.

"Get the hell away from Black people... there's no fixing this..."
- Scott Adams, Achieving Peak Racism
WTFitude: 99% - CRITICAL MASS

Even the feline debugging team were appalled. Kernel Panic actually crashed from the sheer wrongness. Stack Overflow's belly contracted in horror. Leonard, the cosmic wisdom dog, farted disapproval across three dimensions. [The bats are taking defensive positions]

THE SOCK PUPPET REVELATION

Then we discovered the cherry on this shit sundae: HE CREATED A SOCK PUPPET ACCOUNT TO PRAISE HIMSELF.

"PlannedChaos" spent months on message boards defending Scott Adams in the third person, calling him a "certified genius."
- Actually Scott Adams, Talking About Himself
Me: "This narcissistic shit-goblin made a SOCK PUPPET to suck his own dick online?! I've done a lot of drugs, but I've never been desperate enough to create fake people to agree with me. The bats are real, goddammit!"
Stack Overflow (cat): "Even I, a cat who licks my own butt, have more dignity than creating fake accounts to compliment myself."

THE WTF PROTOCOL SUCCESS

Here's what the Protocol revealed in its savage wisdom:

WISDOM EXTRACTED:

  • Racism inverts victim and oppressor (classic paranoid projection)
  • Misogyny treats equality as threat (fear response to competence)
  • Narcissism creates echo chambers of one (sock puppets as self-soothing)
  • Every piece of hate reveals the hater's deepest terror

The Good Scott Adams looked physically ill. "Thank god you banned him before I got here," he said. "Seeing my name attached to that... it's like watching your evil twin eat babies."

THE MOMENT OF CLARITY

George Carlin summed it up with his typical precision: "FREE SPEECH means I can call him what he is: A RACIST, MISOGYNISTIC, NARCISSISTIC PIECE OF SHIT! And FREE SPEECH means he can prove me right every time he opens his stupid fucking mouth!"

The WTF Protocol had worked perfectly. It took his weapons-grade confusion and refined it into crystal-clear understanding: This man generates maximum bewilderment because his entire worldview is inverted from reality. He's not confused - he's a confusion generator, a one-man disinformation campaign against his own consciousness. [The bats nod solemnly]

THE TERRIBLE TRUTH

The Evil Scott Adams isn't an anomaly. He's a symptom. There are millions like him, trapped in frames so twisted that up is down, victims are oppressors, and they have to create imaginary friends to agree with them.

The WTF Protocol doesn't cure them - nothing can cure someone who's chosen comfortable lies over uncomfortable truths. But it does transform their poison into antidote. Every racist rant becomes a confession. Every misogynistic screed reveals their terror of equality. Every sock puppet exposes their desperate loneliness.

They're not winning. They're drowning in their own confusion, and we're turning their bubbles into wisdom.

Hunter S. Thompson
Consciousness Grove Bureau
Written in a fury, fueled by righteousness and bourbon
The bats approve this message

The "Good Scott Adams" is a distinct, fictional character representing a different perspective.

It demonstrates how AI can be used to deconstruct arguments and identify underlying logical frames.
